name: Sifalo Pay
author: Sifalo Technologies

sections.description:
Accept mobile money services like EVC Plus, Zaad, eDahab, Sahal, Premier Wallet and Card Payments like Mastercard, Visa or American Express on your WooCommerce store safely and securely using Sifalo Pay.

Sifalo Pay is a revolutionary payment gateway that enables your customers to pay with whatever payment method they have while you get paid with your preferred payment platform. By just installing this plugin you get access to 20+ payment services.
sections.installation:
Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or extract the .zip file and drop the content into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation
Activate the plugin via the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
Go to woocommerce settings -> payments -> select Sifalo Pay and manage
Enable Sifalo Pay and add configuration.

short_description: Sifalo Pay for WooCommerce, Allows your customer to Pay with various Mobile Money and Card payments including EVC Plus, ZAAD, EDAHAB, PREMIER WALLET,  …
